title: #054 - BERT KREISCHER - UNCLE JOEY'S JOINT
description:
Welcome to Uncle Joey's Joint.....

It's Wednesday, April 7th.....

Today, we talked to The Machine himself, BERT KREISCHER.....

This episode is brought to you by DraftKings, CBD Lion & LUCY Nicotine Gum......

Go to https://www.DraftKings.com PROMO CODE: JOEY

Go to https://www.CBDLion.com PROMO CODE: JOEY or CHURCH

Go to https://www.Lucy.co PROMO CODE: JOEY

And don’t forget.....

The Mind Of Joey Diaz is on PATREON:

https://www.patreon.com/joeydiaz

#JoeyDiaz #Madflavor #UncleJoeysJoint #BertKreischer

Huge Thanks to BEN TELFORD for the Tremendous intro video.....

You can find Ben here:

Ben Telford Visuals

Cinematography and Visual Promotion Agency, Ontario, Canada

visuals@benjamintelford.com

Instagram: https://www.Instagram.com/b_telford or https://www.instagram.com/bentelfordvisuals
